name: Foodtopia Indev v1.5.2
description:
Controls

WASD or Arrow Keys to move and jump

Z to slash

Tab to Pause

E to Talk or Interact with stuff

Foodtopia is a 2D platformer with sword mechanics! Jump and run through 2 long and fun levels to beat the game! Check out my page: https://2ndflame.itch.io 

There is no tunes, but those will be composed soon enough. Wait for Indev v1.6 for that.
